templates.name: Contrarian Thread
templates.description: Challenge common beliefs with your opinion
templates.useCase: Hot takes, unpopular opinions, challenging conventional wisdom

pattern: Insights: 3-5 numbered points supporting your view

hooks: Everyone's wrong about {TOPIC}
Unpopular opinion: {TOPIC} is overrated
Hot take: {TOPIC} will fail. Here's why:
The truth about {TOPIC} that nobody talks about:
examples: Everyone's wrong about microservices. Here's why monoliths win for 90% of startups:
Unpopular opinion: React Server Components are overrated for most use cases

templates.name: How-To Thread
templates.useCase: Teaching a process, sharing a framework, actionable advice

pattern: CTA: Encourage them to try it

hooks: How I {ACHIEVED_RESULT} in {TIMEFRAME}:
{NUMBER} steps to {ACHIEVE_GOAL}:
The exact system I use to {DO_SOMETHING}:
Here's how to {SOLVE_PROBLEM} in {TIMEFRAME}:
examples: How I went from 0 to 10K followers in 90 days:
5 steps to debug production issues 10x faster:
